content: SAO PAULO  Oct 31 Brazilian petrochemical producer Braskem SA on Tuesday denied reports that LyondellBasell Industries NV had approached it with a takeover offer.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV

content: LyondellBasell Industries NV  has approached Brazil's Braskem SA   for a potential takeover  valuing the petrochemicals company at more than $10 billion  the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.

title: LyondellBasell approaches Brazil's Braskem for takeover: WSJ

content: SAO PAULO Brazilian construction conglomerate Odebrecht SA said on Monday that it wants to keep Braskem SA  in its investment portfolio  after a report that LyondellBasell Industries NV  had approached the petrochemicals producer about a potential takeover.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Odebrecht says it wants to keep Braskem stake  following takeover report

content: HOUSTON  Feb 3 Differing estimates between would-be buyers and LyondellBasell Industries over the value of the company's Houston refinery resulted in Lyondell's inability to sell the plant last year  Chief Executive Bob Patel said on Friday.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: UPDATE 1-Lyondell  buyers differed on value of Houston refinery -CEO

content: HOUSTON Two top U.S. refining executives are leaving LyondellBasell Industries as the company nears an agreement to sell its Houston refinery  sources familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Top Lyondell refining executives leaving before refinery sale: sources

content: HOUSTON LyondellBasell Industries' 263 776 barrel per day (bpd) Houston refinery continues to operate the gasoline-producing fluidic catalytic cracking unit at reduced rates while repairs from a Sept. 1 power outage continue  said Gulf Coast market sources on Monday.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Lyondell Houston FCCU production reduced due to repairs: sources

content: HOUSTON A 91 000 barrel per day (bpd) vacuum distillation unit was shut by a pump failure on Tuesday at LyondellBasell Industries' 263 776 bpd Houston refinery  Gulf Coast market sources said.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Lyondell Houston refinery VDU shut by pump failure: sources

content: HOUSTON/NEW YORK  Sept 5 Saudi Aramco  and its U.S. refining joint-venture Motiva Enterprises lead the race to buy LyondellBasell Industries Houston refinery  according to three sources familiar with the matter.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: UPDATE 1-Saudi Aramco-Motiva in lead to buy Lyondell's Houston refinery-sources

content: HOUSTON/NEW YORK Saudi Aramco and its U.S. refining joint-venture Motiva Enterprises [MOTIV.UL] lead the race to buy LyondellBasell Industries Houston refinery  according to three sources familiar with the matter.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Saudi Aramco-Motiva in lead to buy Lyondell's Houston refinery: sources

content: LyondellBasell Industries has put its 263 776 barrel per day (bpd) Houston refinery up for sale.

title: Factbox: Outages at the Lyondell Houston refinery

content: HOUSTON LyondellBasell Industries was restoring production at its 263 776 barrel per day (bpd) Houston refinery after a midday power interruption robbed the plant of steam supply on Thursday.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Lyondell Houston refinery restoring production after steam loss

content: HOUSTON LyondellBasell Industries returned its 263 776 barrel per day Houston refinery to normal operations on Wednesday  one day after a power interruption on a unit cut production in half  sources familiar with plant operations said.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Lyondell's Houston refinery returns to normal operations: sources

content: HOUSTON  May 16 A coking unit at LyondellBasell Industries' refinery in Houston is expected to restart between late May and mid-June for the first time since being damaged in an April 8 fire  Gulf Coast market sources said on Monday.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Lyondell's Houston coker restart expected by mid-June -sources

content: HOUSTON Lyondell Basell Industries has cut production at its 263 776 barrel-per-day (bpd) Houston refinery by as much as 25 percent for between 10 days and a month to fix a coker damaged in a Friday morning blaze  sources familiar with operations told Reuters.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Lyondell cuts output at Houston refinery after fire: sources

content: HOUSTON  April 8 Lyondell Basell Industries  has cut production at its 263 776 barrel-per-day (bpd) Houston refinery by as much as 25 percent for between 10 days and a month to fix a coker damaged in a Friday morning blaze  sources familiar with operations told Reuters.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: UPDATE 3-Lyondell cuts output at Houston refinery after fire -sources

content: HOUSTON Lyondell Basell Industries Chief Executive Bob Patel said on Wednesday the chemical company may at some stage sell its 263 776 barrel per day (bpd) Houston refinery.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Lyondell CEO Patel says Houston refinery may be sold 'in longer term'

content: HOUSTON Hourly workers striking against LyondellBasell Industries NV's  Houston refinery voted on Thursday to ratify a new four-year contract  clearing a key hurdle on the way to ending a three-month-long strike  according to a union official.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: Striking Lyondell Houston refinery workers OK new contract: union

content: General Motors Co  on Thursday named Craig Glidden  chief legal officer at chemicals company LyondellBasell Industries NV   as general counsel  succeeding Michael Millikin  who is retiring in July.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: GM names LyondellBasell lawyer as chief counsel

content: HOUSTON  Feb 18 The largest U.S refinery workers strike since 1980 entered its 18th day on Wednesday as union and oil company representatives renewed face-to-face negotiations over safety and pay  after a week's hiatus.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: UPDATE 1-U.S. refinery strike enters 18th day as talks restart

title: UPDATE 2-GM names LyondellBasell lawyer as chief counsel

content: NEW YORK  Feb 19 General Motors Co on Thursday named Craig Glidden  chief legal officer at chemicals company LyondellBasell Industries NV  as its general counsel to succeed Michael Millikin who is retiring in July.
name: LyondellBasell Industries NV
title: GM names LyondellBasell lawyer to succeed Millikin as chief counsel
